about_the_game: This game is a role-playing game made with RPG Maker MV, telling the adventures and challenges faced by Camp Leader A and their team as they go on quests to defeat hostile forces, establish their camp, and unlock new systems such as the Arena, Insect Farm, Fishing System, and more. The game combines various elements including combat, gathering, farming, and building. Players must complete quests to enhance their characters' abilities, explore a vast world map, and confront various random events and enemies. With a rich storyline, distinctive characters, and stunning skill animations, the game offers an immersive gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes: violent sense may occur in the battle scene

detailed_description: This game is a role-playing game made with RPG Maker MV, telling the adventures and challenges faced by Camp Leader A and their team as they go on quests to defeat hostile forces, establish their camp, and unlock new systems such as the Arena, Insect Farm, Fishing System, and more. The game combines various elements including combat, gathering, farming, and building. Players must complete quests to enhance their characters' abilities, explore a vast world map, and confront various random events and enemies. With a rich storyline, distinctive characters, and stunning skill animations, the game offers an immersive gaming experience.
name: 六足冒险 the legend of six legged

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: micrsoft 64bit Window7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 Compliant graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: micrsoft 64bit Window7.8.10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compliant graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: This RPG game shows a story of A's team battle against enemies, and unlock features like the Arena & Insect Farm. Players engage in combat, fishing，fun-minigames, completing tasks to level up.
